DOC.brief_title: The Use Microneedles Expedite Treatment Time Photodynamic Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: The current standard care photodynamic therapy treat actinic keratoses include pre-treatment area topical aminolevulinic acid 1 hour , follow treatment blue light . In previous study , investigator show pretreatment microneedles enhance penetration topical aminolevulinic acid compare control group . The aim study investigate vary incubation period topical aminolevulinic acid pretreatment microneedle application facilitate penetration efficacy photodynamic therapy .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Subjects actinic keratoses qualifies photodynamic therapy Do meet exclusion criterion Subjects smoke Subjects photosensitize condition lupus , porphyria , similar condition Subjects establish allergy topical ALA Subjects document nonmelanoma skin cancer face past 6 month
